Articles.Content: I am really excited for Colonies and multiplayer i have been waiting for ksp to years now even since i got ksp 1 in 2013 now its only a few days out i cant wait to get my hands on it and start playing being able to make bigger space stations i am also really excited for ive always loved making space stations and now i can make bigger and better ones thats going to really fun. also the graphics look insane compered to ksp 1 and going be really cool to see having all these graphics and flying though them i am also really excited to see what the community  does with ksp 2 what mods they make and how they reply to the release over all i am excited for every single thing in ksp 2 and i cant wait to try it.
Pretty hyped to tour the new planets! ^^
I'm excited for actually functional colonies and bases.
I'm hyped for the colonies and interstellar,  as well as the new and improved features.

Hello World!

Let me tell you something...

The millisecond that colonies are implemented...

I'm going to the highest peak of Eve and building a launch pad.

Then I'm going to pay my respects to the dozens of lost kerbals who almost made it out of the atmosphere and bravely watched their last stage run dry and slowly fall back down to be consumed by the purple beast.

The first 5000m will always be free after that.  Mua ha ha!

Edited February 23, 2023 by poopslayer78
grammar fix
Me! I want it! more rockets and more Boosters!!! and more Engine noise!
I'm looking forward to colonies, interstellar flights, and multiplayer. Unfortunately, I guess I get to wait for those.
I am excited for Multiplayer and the new KSC.
I can't wait to try the color picker, that's a totally new feature.
I am excited for the new method to get science point ,to the new part and for localization it
I'm most hyped for interstellar travel/colonies and adventure mode.
i'm excited for the more advanced drives, no longer shall i be limited to chemical and ion
new horizon of modding - and LUA
Just excited to get back into KSP.
Seeing the new facelift, and seeing the game develop and mature!
I'm really excited for colony building, when the update releases. There's only so much that you can do in KSP1 with mods.
As a new KSP player, I'm the most excited about the upgraded graphics and the new parts added to the new game.
Orbital construction, without a doubt. Let's break free from the shackles of gravity and the VAB when it comes to building large spaceships!
As a planet modder, I'm excited for the revamped celestial bodies!
Excited for the upcoming multiplayer system
I'm excited for the possible multiplayer features, and faster load times.
KSP 2 заманил меня своими колониями и межзвездными водами, лучше, чем KSP 1.
I'm looking forward to KSP2 release.
I'm excited for stock interstellar colonies that can launch their own ships.
Colonies that don't feel janky is what I am excited for.
